tool_description: It extracts important keywords in a sentence and also provides their entity types. Alongwith the keywords and entities, you also get the start and end index values of the keywords in your sentence.
name: Text Keyword Extractor
title: Text Keyword Extractor

api_list.name: Keyword Extractor
api_list.description: It extracts important keywords in a sentence and also provides their entity types.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-keyword-extractor.p.rapidapi.com/keyword-extractor"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-keyword-extractor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
